item.title: Charan Sai K
item.description: Bangalore, India A Software Engineer with a reach in a wide range of technologies with an emphasis on Thin Clients and related technologies, adaptive and flexible to meet the demands of the job and learn a lot from the people he is around. Work Experience Software Engineer I5 –(Oct 2021)–> I6 Dell Technologies | Aug 2019 - Present Unix Developer for Dell ThinOS, VPN stack enhancements, application/daemon development, Audio stack bringup for new platforms, kernel debugging, build management, scripting and addressing security vulnerabilities.

item.title: Work History
item.description: Software Engineer I6 Dell Technologies | Oct 2021 - Present Unix Developer for Dell ThinOS, VPN stack enhancements, application/daemon development, Audio stack bringup for new platforms, kernel debugging and build management. Software Engineer I5 Dell Technologies | Aug 2019 - Oct 2021 Unix Developer for Wyse ThinOS. Facilitated multiple maintenace releases. Activities as dev included enhancements, debugging, scripting and addressing security vulnerabilities.
